languages.text: Magus picks a point in 20 cells range. All his allies in range of 5 cells around this point gain 15 temporary wounds.
languages.translation_comment: Магус выбирает точку в ренже 20клеток. Все союзные цели в радиусе 5 от этой точки получают 15 временных вундов.

traits.locale_text: Magus picks a point in 20 cells range. All his allies in range of 5 cells around this point gain 15 temporary wounds.

languages.text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Magus picks a point in 20 cells range. All his allies in range of 5 cells around this point gain 15 temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell in a 20-cell range. All his allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 temporary wounds.
The Mental Tyrant selects a cell in a 20-cell range. All his allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 temporary wounds.
The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 temporary wounds.
The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

languages.text: El tirano mental elige una casilla en un radio de 20 casillas. Todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas de la elegida ganan +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El tirano mental elige una casilla en un radio de 20 casillas. Todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas de la elegida ganan +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

languages.text: 精神的支配者は半径20セル内のセルを選択する。そのセルの半径5セル内にいるすべての味方は、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を+15得る。
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 精神的支配者は半径20セル内のセルを選択する。そのセルの半径5セル内にいるすべての味方は、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を+15得る。

languages.text: 心灵暴君选择20格内的任意格子，目标格周围5格内的所有盟友获得15点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 心灵暴君选择20格内的任意格子，目标格周围5格内的所有盟友获得15点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Der Mentaltyrann wählt eine Zelle in einem Radius von 20 Zellen aus. Alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 5 Zellen um diese Zelle erhalten +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Mentaltyrann wählt eine Zelle in einem Radius von 20 Zellen aus. Alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 5 Zellen um diese Zelle erhalten +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Le Tyran psychique sélectionne une cellule dans un rayon de 20 cases. Tous les alliés dans un rayon de 5 cases gagnent +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Tyran psychique sélectionne une cellule dans un rayon de 20 cases. Tous les alliés dans un rayon de 5 cases gagnent +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

languages.text: Ментальный тиран выбирает клетку на расстоянии до 20 клеток. Все его союзники в радиусе 5 клеток вокруг нее получают +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ментальный тиран выбирает клетку на расстоянии до 20 клеток. Все его союзники в радиусе 5 клеток вокруг нее получают +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
Ментальный тиран выбирает клетку на расстоянии до 20 клеток. Все его союзники в радиусе 5 клеток вокруг нее получают +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: Zihin Tiranı, 20 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bir hücre seçer. O hücrenin çevresindeki 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm dost birimler, +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
languages.original_text: The Mental Tyrant selects a cell within a 20-cell radius. All allies in a 5-cell radius around that cell gain +15 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
